content: भाष् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (भाषते, भाषित) {@--1@} To say, speak, utter; त्वयैकमीशं प्रति साधु भाषितं <ls>Ku. 5. 81</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> with two <ab>acc.</ab>; भीतां प्रियामेत्य वचो बभाषे <ls>R. 7. 66</ls>; आखंडलः काममिदं बभाषे <ls>Ku. 3. 11</ls>; <ls>Bk. 9. 122.</ls> {@--2@} To speak to, address; किंचिद्विहस्यार्थपतिं बभाषे <ls>R. 2. 46</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 51.</ls> {@--3@} To tell, announce, declare; क्षितिपालमुच्चैः प्रीत्या तमेवार्थमभाषतेव <ls>R. 2. 51.</ls> {@--4@} To speak or talk about. {@--5@} To name, call. {@--6@} To describe. --WITH अनु {1} to speak, say. {2} to communicate, announce; <ls>Ms. 11. 229.</ls>
